[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”4711″ img_size=”full”]

New 72 Cavity Preform Mould
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″]

PET Moulds

[vc_column_text]WASHUN is the professional Chinese PET preform mould manufacturer, supplier and maker. Our PET mould department offers the dedicated team for all kinds of preform designs and manufacturing different type of preform moulds, such as the thick wall preform moulds which mainly designed for the 5 gallon PET preforms, wide mouth preform moulds that has been used widely for the nuts or candy industry and other standard preform mould for the bottled waters, CSD, edible oils and so on. [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]The new advanced hot runner with valve gate system for the micro-pitch preform mould have been introduced to the market, it helps the preform producer reducing the power consumption of the molds and Tonnage of the preform molding system. The number of cavities is up to 96 cavities for standard neck finishes, such as PCO 1881, PCO1810, and 30/25. The cam roller design for the thread splits helps operator maintenance freely.

WASHUN provides the preform mould refurbishment and preform weight, neck finish conversion service for other brand.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4714″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/products/pet-moulds/pet-preform-moulds/”]
